headline: Is Now the Right Moment to Reassess Zoetis After Recent FDA Approval News?
summary: Standing at a crossroads with Zoetis? If you have been tracking the animal health giant, you have definitely noticed the rollercoaster ride its stock price has taken lately. After a solid 3.8% bounce in the last week, the stock is still down 4.2% over the past month and down almost 10% year to date. Over the longer haul, returns look even rougher with a 22.4% drop in the past year and a 6.3% decline in five years. Naturally, these numbers might make you wonder: does this slump open the door...
